faq.question: What exactly is a 'system' in your context?
faq.answer: A system is a documented, repeatable process that produces predictable results regardless of who executes it. It includes SOPs, templates, automations, and training — everything needed to run that function without you.

faq.question: How long until I see results from an installed system?
faq.answer: Most clients see measurable impact within 30-60 days of full implementation. The Client Acquisition Engine typically generates qualified leads within 2 weeks of launch. Results depend on your implementation speed and existing infrastructure.

faq.question: Do you offer done-for-you implementation?
faq.answer: Our core products are done-with-you — we provide the systems, templates, and guidance while you implement. For hands-off installation, we offer Advisory Sprints and Retainer packages for qualified operators.

faq.question: What if a system doesn't work for my business?
faq.answer: Every system comes with a 30-day implementation guarantee. If you fully implement and don't see the promised outcome, we'll work with you 1:1 until you do, or refund your investment.

faq.question: Can I install multiple systems at once?
faq.answer: We recommend installing one system at a time, mastering it, then adding the next. The Systems Stack (all three core systems) includes a suggested implementation sequence and priority framework.
